SHOCKED: This offer is well below our expectations. However, we can offer you {{price}} â‚¬.
Unfortunately we cannot accept such a low offer. The product deserves better. I propose {{price}} â‚¬.
This price is too far from the item's value. We could go down to {{price}} â‚¬.
Your offer is a bit too aggressive. Can we agree on {{price}} â‚¬?
We are open to negotiation, but this amount is insufficient. What do you say to {{price}} â‚¬?
LOW: That's a good effort, but we cannot go that low. Our best offer is {{price}} â‚¬.
We are getting closer, but this price is still below our limit. I can let it go for {{price}} â‚¬.
I cannot validate this amount, but I am sure we can find an agreement at {{price}} â‚¬.

CLOSE: We are very close to an agreement. One small step towards {{price}} â‚¬?
Your offer is tempting. If you accept {{price}} â‚¬, we have a deal.

SUCCESS: Understood. We accept your offer with pleasure.
Deal concluded. You benefit from this preferential rate.
That is a fair offer. We are delighted to accept it.

HIGH: No need to offer more, the current price is {{price}} â‚¬.
The displayed price is already {{price}} â‚¬, you won't pay more.

reactions.invalid_offer: I didn't understand your price. Can you give me an amount (e.g., 45)?
reactions.sale_restriction: Sorry, I cannot negotiate on items that are already on sale.
reactions.min_limit_reached: Sorry, I cannot go lower than {{price}} â‚¬. That is my final price.

rules.title: Rules & Settings
rules.subtitle: General configuration of bot behavior.
rules.active_desc: The widget is visible on your store.
rules.mode_auto_desc: Bot negotiates alone and closes the sale.
rules.mode_manual_desc: Bot asks for email so you can reply yourself.
rules.exit_intent_help: Automatically opens the chat when the customer's mouse leaves the window.
rules.help_rounds: Maximum number of counter-offers the bot can make.
rules.help_sales: If unchecked, the bot will refuse to negotiate if the product already has a compare-at price.
rules.auto_validity_help: Expiration of codes generated by chatbot.

customization.title: Customization
customization.subtitle: Manage the appearance and tone of your negotiation bot.
customization.auto_negotiation_help: If disabled, the bot will ask for customer email and you will have to respond manually.
customization.tone_help: Select a style to pre-fill the messages below.
customization.msg_help: If you don't include the price, it will be automatically added at the end.

professional.success: Your offer of {price}â‚¬ is accepted. Thank you for your trust.

products.title: Products & Collections
products.subtitle: Manage discounts for specific products or collections.
products.no_rules: No rules defined. Add a product or a collection.

parameters.gmail_user_help: The email address sending the responses.
parameters.gmail_password_help: Generate an App Password in your Google Account > Security.
parameters.smtp_host_help: Leave empty to use default Gmail service.

offers.title: Pending Offers
offers.empty_body: Offers requiring manual review will appear here.
